subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Juan Pablo Ángel scored two goals to lead the Red Bulls to a 4-1 victory against D.C. United in East Rutherford, N.J. Sinisa Ubiparipovic added his first goal in Major League Soccer and Mike Magee also scored for the Red Bulls (6-6-7), who snapped a five-game winless streak. Jaime Moreno had given D.C. United (8-9-1) the lead in the 16th minute.
